data.description:
DimSim

A DimSim was a personal, custom designed portable holographic projector that created a shield of darkness over the wearer's face. DimSims worked to obscure their owner's identity rather than disguising it.

Model: DimSim (custom designed unit)
Type: Personal holographic projector/interference unit
Cost: 5,000
Availability: 4, X
Game Notes: DimSim completely conceals the user’s features.
Source: Galaxy Guide 11: Criminal Organizations (page 85), Gundark’s Fantastic Technology (page 107)
data.label: OD6S.CHAR_GEAR
